gg.acai.aurora.hyperparameter

Class HyperparameterTuningBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.acai.aurora.hyperparameter.HyperparameterTuningBuilder

  • public class HyperparameterTuningBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for HyperparameterTuning. HyperparameterTuning can be used to find the best hyperparameters for a given model.

    Example Usage: (in this example, we are tuning a neural network)

      
    HyperparameterTuning tuning = new HyperparameterTuningBuilder()
       .options(options -> options
         .generateTunes(MinMaxParameters.builder()
           .learningRate(0.01, 0.1, 0.02) // min --> max --> step
           .epochs(1, 1_000) // min --> max
           .layers(1, 2) // min --> max
           .build())
         .evaluator(new CrossValidator(4, new BestAccuracyEvaluator())))
       .processor(tune -> new NeuralNetworkBuilder()
         .learningRate(tune.learningRate())
         .epochs(tune.epochs())
         .layers(mapper -> mapper
           .inputLayers(inputLayerSize)
           .hiddenLayers(tune.layers())
           .outputLayers(outputLayerSize))
         .disableStatsPrint()
         .build())
       .inputs(inputs)
       .targets(outputs)
       .build();

     HyperparameterTuningResult result = tuning.find();

    Tuning is thread-safe and supports parallel tuning. by default, the tuning will run on a single thread, but can be parallelized by calling HyperparameterOptionsBuilder.parallel() before building the options.

    Supported evaluators:

    • BestAccuracyEvaluator
    More evaluators will be added in the future.
    Since:
    16.04.2023 21:19 Â© Aurora - All Rights Reserved
    Author:
    Clouke

      • processor

        public HyperparameterTuningBuilder processor(java.util.function.Function<Tune,Trainable> processor)
        Applies the required processor for the tuning.

        The processor is a function that accepts a tune and returns a trainable model. See the example usage in the class documentation.

        Example Trainables:

        • NeuralNetwork
        • LogisticRegression
        • LinearRegression
        • LearningVectorQuantization
        as well as any other model that implements Trainable.
        Parameters:
        processor - the processor for the tuning
        Returns:
        Returns this builder for chaining.

      • build

        public HyperparameterTuning build()
        Builds the HyperparameterTuning instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the built instance.
